Overview
SmartSimple is a cloud-based tracking and reporting platform that helps organizations automate their critical processes. With robust baseline 
CRM
 (customer relationship management) capabilities, SmartSimple offers unparalleled flexibility in the way organizations can collaborate and engage with their staff and external community.
The idea of SmartSimple was hatched in the winter of 2002, with co-founders 
Mike Reid and Keith Yau
 still proudly running the organization today.
Please see our website for a history of SmartSimple. 
View it here
Structure of the System
The SmartSimple system provides organizations with an advanced database, on-demand integrated 
applications
 and 
role
 based interfaces to meet their current and future business needs.
On-Demand Applications
 – SmartSimple includes over a dozen on-demand 
applications
 that address needs such as contact management, 
email broadcasting
, project tracking and 
applicant tracking
 requirements.
 All 
applications
 are built using the SmartSimple database, which provides immediate use of each application.
 All access to the system, the database and each application is controlled by 
roles
, so each 
user’s
 view of the system is controlled and based on their engagement with the organisation.
Extendibility Data Model
 – The SmartSimple database can be extended without programming to gather (and report) on any number of additional fields.
 As business requirements evolve, you can easily modify the system to meet new requirements.
 
Workflows
 can be used throughout the system to automate approval, alert and acknowledge 
applications
.
 Economically Affordable Model – The database, applications and features are included in a simple monthly or per 
user
 cost.
 SmartSimple is based on open source standards so no incremental licensing is required (such as Microsoft, Oracle or Crystal client access licenses).
 All customization and configuration work can be done in-house without the need for specialized programming resources.
Completely Web Based
 – All functionality is delivered via a 
browser
 on any computer.
 No installation is required.
The functionality of the system is easily extended into your website.
